title: Geji: The Spirit Hunter
overview: Kaew, an apprentice spirit medium, takes any job, black or white magic, to earn money and marry Sroi. His poverty leads Sroi to marry his friend, In, instead. Kaew moves to Bangkok after helping In. Later, a pregnant Sroi finds Kaew in Bangkok after In's death. Kaew takes her in. Their rekindled love is ready to destroy everyone involved.
